ISSUE.TITLE: Incorrect product sorting when default 'ProductSortingEnum' value is used
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 > The Product_Category_Mapping table has a DisplayOrder column that should be used when selecting sort by 'Position' within a category. Instead, the Product's DisplayOrder value is being used (default behaviour) within the ProductExtensions static class. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90845/nop-4403-product-category-mapping-display-order-unexpected-behaviour Introduced in https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/commit/ffa7355ce10f1e0c3daa19f0bea4aa195686efee
